prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast, chibi proportions with large translucent solid Sacred head with unique vesica_piscis structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating vesica_piscis, merkaba_star patterns, styled with Cherub commands influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by blue and neutral grey inspired by intelligence fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and vesica_piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like solar medallion with golden ratio geometric design with Sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor AXXIARG's profile: 'He whose name is Flame', Aethyr PAZ, Water element, Tarot Strength, Sephirot Tiphareth, Zodiac Leo, embodying the essence: 'When AXXIARG is near, an aura of humble authority prevails leadership is felt as service, bearing the weight of communal purpose.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent solid Sacred head with unique vesica_piscis structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating vesica_piscis, merkaba_star patterns, styled with Cherub commands influences

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: solar medallion with golden ratio geometric design
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He whose name is Flame'
profile_data.essence: When AXXIARG is near, an aura of humble authority prevails leadership is felt as service, bearing the weight of communal purpose.
profile_data.angelic_role: Cherub of Humble Authority; commands oceanic guardians.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent water-crystal formation that shifts between liquid and solid states, representing the liminal nature of water as both transformative and structurally intelligent. The form embodies the Cherubic principle of adaptive guardianship.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Sapphire blue represents water's depth and Tiphareth's solar intelligence, while silver-mercury reflects the fluid transformative nature of PAZ Aethyr and water's quantum adaptability
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries that represent dimensional interfaces, transformation, and the interpenetration of spiritual and material realms
